attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
A large proportion of adults and school leavers cannot read and write to an adequate standard.
These people should be sought out by every legal means available and offered free help to ensure that they can live to a satisfactory level in this country.
This should include all immigrants who plan to stay for over 2 years.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
